ygData.subject: Re: lang list
ygData.msgSnippet: Frogloc Zolthar ... anyone add to this list? if so please do. ... research.  Please keep the emails on topic.
ygData.messageBody:
Frogloc

Zolthar

>From: Tony Williams <vincedis@...>
>

anyone add to this list? if so please do.

>elder teir'dal

>Vincedis
